column4: If anyone has any help with ubuntu, anything ubuntu, try this source first: http://www.youtube.com/user/CJay554   These sets of videos are designed to help those that want to use ubuntu to its full potential, or those that are just learning the beginnings of ubuntu
I understand, but advertising it in this channel isn't the best way to let people know about it.  You should try to get in contact with the doc team

maybe visit #ubuntu-doc and see if you can get involved with an existing project, integrate your videos somehow, or start a new project.  All the docs are made by users like you, you can certainly help out if you want
